channel.title: Morpheus on Green Reed Technology - Technology without boundaries
channel.description: Recent content in Morpheus on Green Reed Technology - Technology without boundaries

item.title: Moving to Morpheus Data
item.description: I have made the decision to become the director of technical marketing at Morpheus Data and I start that new position today. Morpheus Data is a company that I became aware of during Cloud Field Day 3 (CFD3) while serving as a delegate for the event. Cloud Field Day is one of several events hosted by Gestalt IT in which several vendors present one at a time to a group of IT professionals that ask questions and provide feedback about the presentations.
